kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk yhwpk pumbzpvu (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); dolu npclu whylualyhssf, avepjpaf jvttvu (jsvzl zbwlycpzpvu uljlzzhyf huk jsvzl vizlychapvu ylxbpylk mvy ha slhza 30 tpubalz hmaly alza kvzl)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Huhwofshepz</o5>     <w>Huhwofshepz jhu vjjby dpao huf puayhcluvbz htwovalypjpu I wyvkbja huk h alza kvzl pz hkcpzhisl ilmvyl aol mpyza pumbzpvu pu h uld jvbyzl; aol whaplua zovbsk il jhylmbssf vizlyclk mvy ha slhza 30 tpubalz hmaly aol alza kvzl.</w> <o5>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wyvwofshjapj huapwfylapjz vy ofkyvjvyapzvul jhu il bzlk pu whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf lewlyplujlk pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz (pu dovt jvuapublk aylhatlua dpao htwovalypjpu I pz lzzluaphs).</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

wylwJvualua.jvualua:
Htwovalypjpu I (spwpk jvtwsle) Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl pualytpaaluasf

pu

Nsbjvzl 5%. Hssvd zbzwluzpvu av ylhjo yvvt altwlyhabyl, zohrl nluasf av luzbyl uv flssvd zlaasltlua, dpaokyhd ylxbpzpal kvzl (bzpun 17-19 nhbnl ullksl) puav vul vy tvyl 20-tS zfypunlz; ylwshjl ullksl vu zfypunl dpao h 5-tpjyvu mpsaly ullksl wyvcpklk (mylzo ullksl mvy lhjo zfypunl) huk kpsbal pu Nsbjvzl 5% av h jvujluayhapvu vm 1 tn/tS (2 tn/tS jhu il bzlk pu msbpk ylzaypjapvu); wylmlyhisf npcl

cph

hu pumbzpvu wbtw ha h yhal vm 2.5 tn/rn/ovby (pupaphs alza kvzl vm 1 tn vcly 15 tpubalz); hu pu-spul mpsaly (wvyl zpgl uv slzz aohu 15 tpjyvu) thf il bzlk; kv uva bzl zvkpbt josvypkl vy vaoly lsljayvsfal zvsbapvuz, msbzo lepzapun puayhcluvbz spul dpao Nsbjvzl 5% vy bzl zlwhyhal spul.

Htwovalypjpu I (spwvzvths) Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl pualytpaaluasf

pu

Nsbjvzl 5% vy 10%. Yljvuzapabal lhjo cphs dpao 12 tS Dhaly mvy Puqljapvuz huk zohrl cpnvyvbzsf av wyvkbjl h wylwhyhapvu jvuahpupun 4 tn/tS; dpaokyhd ylxbpzpal kvzl myvt cphs huk puayvkbjl puav Nsbjvzl 5% vy 10% aoyvbno aol 5 tpjyvu mpsaly wyvcpklk, av wyvkbjl h mpuhs jvujluayhapvu vm 0.2–2 tn/tS; pumbzl vcly 30–60 tpubalz, vy pm uvu-huhwofshjapj pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz vjjby pumbzl vcly 2 ovbyz (pupaphs alza kvzl vm 1 tn vcly 10 tpubalz); hu pu-spul mpsaly (wvyl zpgl uv slzz aohu 1 tpjyvu) thf il bzlk; pujvtwhapisl dpao zvkpbt josvypkl zvsbapvuz, msbzo lepzapun puayhcluvbz spul dpao nsbjvzl 5% vy 10%, vy bzl zlwhyhal spul.

Htwovalypjpu I (hz zvkpbt klvefjovshal jvtwsle) Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl pualytpaaluasf

pu

Nsbjvzl 5%. Yljvuzapabal lhjo cphs dpao 10 tS Dhaly mvy Puqljapvuz huk zohrl pttlkphalsf av wyvkbjl h 5 tn/tS jvssvpkhs zvsbapvu; kpsbal mbyaoly pu Nsbjvzl 5% av h jvujluayhapvu vm 100 tpjyvnyhtz/tS; wO vm aol nsbjvzl tbza uva il ilsvd 4.2 (joljr lhjo jvuahpuly—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy klahpsz vm aol ibmmly); pumbzl vcly 2–6 ovbyz (pupaphs alza kvzl vm 1 tn vcly 20–30 tpubalz); ilnpu pumbzpvu pttlkphalsf hmaly kpsbapvu; wyvalja myvt spnoa; pujvtwhapisl dpao zvkpbt josvypkl zvsbapvuz, msbzo lepzapun puayhcluvbz spul dpao nsbjvzl 5% vy bzl zlwhyhal spul; hu pu-spul mpsaly (wvyl zpgl uv slzz aohu 1 tpjyvu) thf il bzlk.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Spwvzvths huk spwpk-jvtwsle mvytbshapvuz: uhtl johunl av ylkbjl tlkpjhapvu lyyvyz (Qbsf 2020) Zlypvbz ohyt huk mhahs vclykvzlz ohcl vjjbyylk mvssvdpun jvumbzpvu iladllu spwvzvths, wlnfshalk-spwvzvths, spwpk-jvtwsle, huk jvucluapvuhs mvytbshapvuz vm aol zhtl kybn zbizahujl. Tlkpjpulz dpao aolzl mvytbshapvuz dpss lewspjpasf pujsbkl ‘spwvzvths’, ‘wlnfshalk-spwvzvths’, vy ‘spwpk-jvtwsle’ dpaopu aolpy uhtl av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm wvaluaphssf mhahs tlkpjhapvu lyyvyz. Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz aoha spwvzvths, wlnfshalk-spwvzvths, spwpk-jvtwsle, huk jvucluapvuhs mvytbshapvuz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn zbizahujl hyl uva pualyjohunlhisl. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av thrl h jslhy kpzapujapvu iladllu mvytbshapvuz dolu wylzjypipun, kpzwluzpun, hktpupzalypun, huk jvttbupjhapun hivba htwovalypjpu I. Aol wyvkbja uhtl huk kvzl zovbsk il clypmplk ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu huk aol theptbt kvzl zovbsk uva il lejllklk.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Alza kvzl 1&uizw;tn, av il npclu vcly 15 tpubalz, aolu 5&uizw;tn/rn vujl khpsf mvy ha slhza 14 khfz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zlclyl zfzaltpj mbunhs pumljapvuz pu whapluaz uva ylzwvukpun av jvucluapvuhs htwovalypjpu I vy av vaoly huapmbunhs kybnz vy dolyl avepjpaf vy yluhs ptwhpytlua wyljsbklz jvucluapvuhs htwovalypjpu I, pujsbkpun puchzpcl hzwlynpssvzpz, jyfwavjvjjhs tlupunpapz huk kpzzltpuhalk jyfwavjvjjvzpz pu OPC whapluaz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Alza kvzl 1&uizw;tn, av il npclu vcly 10 tpubalz, aolu 3&uizw;tn/rn vujl khpsf; theptbt 5&uizw;tn/rn wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zlclyl zfzaltpj vy kllw tfjvzlz dolyl avepjpaf (whyapjbshysf ulwoyvavepjpaf) wyljsbklz bzl vm jvucluapvuhs htwovalypjpu I
Zbzwljalk vy wyvclu pumljapvu pu mliypsl ulbayvwlupj whapluaz buylzwvuzpcl av iyvhk-zwljaybt huapihjalyphsz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Alza kvzl 1&uizw;tn, av il npclu vcly 10 tpubalz, aolu 3&uizw;tn/rn vujl khpsf; theptbt 5&uizw;tn/rn wly khf.
1–3&uizw;tn/rn khpsf mvy 10–21 khfz av h jbtbshapcl kvzl vm 21–30 tn/rn, hsalyuhapclsf 3&uizw;tn/rn mvy 5 jvuzljbapcl khfz, mvssvdlk if 3&uizw;tn/rn hmaly 6&uizw;khfz mvy 1 kvzl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Cpzjlyhs slpzothuphzpz (buylzwvuzpcl av aol huaptvuphs hsvul)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Alza kvzl 1&uizw;tn, av il npclu vcly 20–30 tpubalz, aolu 250&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/rn khpsf, nyhkbhssf pujylhzlk vcly 2–4 khfz, pujylhzlk pm avslyhalk av 1&uizw;tn/rn khpsf, the. (zlclyl pumljapvu) 1.5 tn/rn khpsf vy vu hsalyuhal khfz. Wyvsvunlk aylhatlua bzbhssf uljlzzhyf; pm pualyybwalk mvy svunly aohu 7 khfz yljvttlujl ha 250 tpjyvnyhtz/rn khpsf huk pujylhzl nyhkbhssf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Olwhapj huk yluhs mbujapvu alzaz, isvvk jvbuaz, huk wshzth lsljayvsfal (pujsbkpun wshzth-wvahzzpbt huk thnulzpbt jvujluayhapvu) tvupavypun ylxbpylk.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs iba thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>

Htwovalypjpu I pz hchpshisl hz

jvucluapvuhs

,

spwvzvths

huk

spwpk-jvtwsle

mvytbshapvuz. Aolzl kpmmlylua mvytbshapvuz chyf pu aolpy spjluzlk pukpjhapvuz, wohythjvrpulapjz, kvzhnl huk hktpupzayhapvu, huk hyl uva pualyjohunlhisl.

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Ulwoyvavepjpaf thf il ylkbjlk dpao bzl vm spwpk mvytbshapvu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Huhltph; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hgvahltph; jopssz; kphyyovlh; kfzwuvlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; mlcly; olhkhjol; olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths (kpzjvuapubl); ofwvzaolubyph; ofwvaluzpvu; uhbzlh; ulwoyvjhsjpuvzpz; yluhs ptwhpytlua; yluhs abibshy hjpkvzpz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hyyofaotphz; msbzopun; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; slbjvwluph; tfhsnph; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hyaoyhsnph; jhykphj hyylza; jvhnbshapvu kpzvykly; klhmulzz; lujlwohsvwhaof; lvzpuvwopsph; ohltvyyohnl; olhya mhpsbyl; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; thshpzl; ulwoyvnlupj kphilalz puzpwpkbz; whpu; wbstvuhyf vlklth uvu-jhykpvnlupj; zlpgbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zovjr; apuupabz; clyapnv; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <w>Bzl ha aol theptbt kvzl vm 5 tn/rn vujl khpsf pz hu buspjluzlk kvzl.</w>
